game.name: The Comeback King
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 난이도 조정, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Comeback King is a light-hearted retro boxing management game set in the UK in the 1980s. Take on a washed-up boxer and manage his career. Decide who he'll fight, train him up and send him out into the ring! Can you guide your boxer to a title contest against the division Champion?
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Comeback King is a light-hearted retro boxing management game set in the UK in the 1980s. Take on a washed-up boxer and manage his career. Decide who he'll fight, train him up and send him out into the ring! Can you guide your boxer to a title contest against the division Champion?
